text:
NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OP EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
CURRENT REFERENCE MATERIALS ON EDUCATIONAL TELEVISION
The NAEB receives hundreds of requests each year
asking for information about educational television.
Some persons need only general references that will
provide access to the information they need? others
require much more detailed thought on the writer's part
before useful answers can be prepared.
This general factsheet listing resources available
for consultation and study should be helpful to many
of the persons and institutions asking for information
about educational television. We hope that the references
here will accomplish this objective and invite specific
questions that these materials may stimulate.
10-65/500
